医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员确定了导致阿尔茨海默病和衰老的关键细胞相互作用对超过 160 万个老年人脑细胞的分析捕捉到了阿尔茨海默病早期阶段发生的细胞变化，这可能揭示预防老年人痴呆症最常见原因的新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Researchers-identify-key-cellular-interactions-driven-Alzheimers-and-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Researchers-identify-key-cellular-interactions-driven-Alzheimers-and-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e351546-f717-4657-8ab7-debbb8c13aa4 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 21:14:35 -0400 Researchers identify key cellular interactions driving Alzheimer's and aging
新研究显示早期胚胎容易出现染色体复制错误日本理化学研究所生物系统动力学中心 (BDR) 研究人员的一项新发现颠覆了数十年来有关 DNA 复制的假设。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Early-embryos-are-prone-to-chromosomal-copying-errors-new-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Early-embryos-are-prone-to-chromosomal-copying-errors-new-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=405f6681-b4fa-4b41-a320-197fcf1d0d71 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 21:09:57 -0400 Early embryos are prone to chromosomal copying errors, new research shows
16 名有前途的博士后科学家荣获达蒙·鲁尼恩 (Damon Runyon) 癌症研究奖学金Damon Runyon 癌症研究基金会任命了 16 名新的 Damon Runyon 研究员，他们是杰出的博士后科学家，在领先的高级研究人员的实验室中进行基础和转化癌症研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/16-promising-post doctor-scientists-awarded-Damon-Runyon-Fellowships-for-cancer-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/16-promising-post doctor-scientists-awarded-Damon-Runyon-Fellowships-for-cancer-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d13b1054-fbee-4c40-a2f0-b4b44802bb8d Wed, 28 Aug 2024 21:00:54 -0400 16 promising postdoctoral scientists awarded Damon Runyon Fellowships for cancer research
神经科学家解码大脑对意外感官输入的反应研究人员发现了新皮质和丘脑这两个大脑区域如何协同工作来检测动物对环境的期望与实际事件之间的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Neuroscientists-decode-the-braine28099s-response-to-unexpected-sensory-inputs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Neuroscientists-decode-the-braine28099s-response-to-unexpected-sensory-inputs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ceaf70ca-0cbf-42b8-a38e-4147e57ab099 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 20:56:41 -0400 Neuroscientists decode the brain’s response to unexpected sensory inputs
过去十年肾脏捐赠者的死亡风险显着下降捐献肾脏进行移植的人的死亡风险 -；十年前就已经很小了-；一项新的研究显示，自那时以来，这一数字下降了一半以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Kidney-donors-mortality-risk-drops-significantly-over-the-past-decade.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Kidney-donors-mortality-risk-drops-significantly-over-the-past-decade.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c018ac8-59da-40cf-acd6-2573ec882ef5 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 20:49:17 -0400 Kidney donors' mortality risk drops significantly over the past decade
解释与 COVID-19 疫苗接种相关的心肌炎风险研究调查了与 COVID-19 mRNA 疫苗接种、COVID-19 感染和其他原因相关的心肌炎风险。研究发现，与其他原因引起的心肌炎相比，接种疫苗后心肌炎的发病率增加，但死亡率和住院率显着降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Myocarditis-risks-linked-to-COVID-19-vaccination-explained.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Myocarditis-risks-linked-to-COVID-19-vaccination-explained.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be90ff67-03e5-4cc5-ae9d-85fdc166bd7c Wed, 28 Aug 2024 20:49:00 -0400 Myocarditis risks linked to COVID-19 vaccination explained
研究证实 2 型糖尿病患者的血糖水平与音调之间存在联系作为对声音生物标志物及其在增强健康结果方面所发挥的作用的持续探索的一部分，Klick Labs 今天在《科学报告》上发表了一项新研究——证实了血糖水平和音调之间的联系，并为非生物标志物的未来进步打开了大门。 - 对 2 型糖尿病患者进行侵入式血糖监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Study-confirms-the-link- Between-blood-glucose-levels-and-voice-pitch-in-people-with-Type-2-diabetes。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Study-confirms-the-link- Between-blood-glucose-levels-and-voice-pitch-in-people-with-Type-2-diabetes。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=251f9037-4935-4ab1-bc47-29ff30ce315b Wed, 28 Aug 2024 20:44:01 -0400 Study confirms the link between blood glucose levels and voice pitch in people with Type 2 diabetes
2024 年巴黎奥运会：具有新冠疫情意识的国家主导了金牌研究发现，在 COVID-19 大流行期间超额死亡率较低的国家，尤其是西太平洋国家，在 2024 年巴黎奥运会上赢得金牌表现出色。这一成功与其严格的公共卫生措施和“新冠病毒谨慎”态度有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Paris-2024-Olympics-COVID-thought-nations-dominated-gold-medals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Paris-2024-Olympics-新冠意识-nations-dominated-gold-medals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e57278ac-84b5-44ca-bc96-b5e00aeb54e3 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 18:53:00 -0400 Paris 2024 Olympics: COVID-conscious nations dominated gold medals
迷幻药：药物滥用治疗的新希望研究探讨了治疗药物滥用障碍的迷幻研究的历史和现状，强调了限制性政策、缺乏资金以及承认传统和现代治疗实践的必要性等挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Psychedelics-A-new-hope-for-substance-abuse-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Psychedelics-A-new-hope-for-substance-abuse-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4676bc73-ec6b-4ae4-b12c-cd5073691479 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 18:34:00 -0400 Psychedelics: A new hope for substance abuse treatment
减轻焦虑：学校音乐教育的作用研究使用 FAHP 和模糊 TOPSIS 来评估减少学生焦虑和抑郁的音乐教育策略，确定音乐欣赏和自我保健是最有效的干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Alleviating-anxiety-The-role-of-music-education-in-schools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Alleviating-anxiety-The-role-of-music-education-in-schools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0600d9ca-5f77-4d33-ac28-213f2344cb1b Wed, 28 Aug 2024 18:20:00 -0400 Alleviating anxiety: The role of music education in schools
